pages.text: Artifacts adds a variety of powerful and unique items that provide special abilities. $(br2)Explore the world to find hidden structures, loot chests, and uncover ancient artifacts.
Find magical items like the Umbrella, which protects you from falls, or the Everlasting Beef, which grants unlimited food. $(br2)Each artifact adds a new layer of fun and utility to your adventures.

In this modpack, cows no longer drop Everlasting Beef. $(br2)Legend has it that a powerful sorcerer cursed the cattle, fearing their meat would grant immortality to those unworthy of it. $(br2)Now, you'll need to seek out hidden treasure chests to find this rare artifact.
